title: Ep. 147 - Clueless with Suzanne Park!
itunes:title: Ep. 147 - Clueless with Suzanne Park!
description:
Hey HBs! It's another boring episode of Heaving Bosoms..... AS IF!! Melody is joined by author Suzanne Park to recap the 1995 classic CLUELESS! Get ready for a big nostalgia recap! Check out Suzanne's work, The Perfect Escape, a YA rom-com and Loathe At First Sight, a sweet adult rom-com set in the video game industry with lots of enemies-to-lovers goodness (out August 18. 2020).. 
 Bonus Content:
 Magic Mike in the Zombie Apocalypse, Mark Wahlberg is racist trash who has been convicted of multiple hate crimes and please don't forget it, is Clueless a teen dating How-To? Suzanne and I unfortunately thought so, *Bing Boong Bong* Fire Safety with Erin, and so much more! 
 Lady Loves: 
 Melody: Insecure. The whole thing because Issa Rae and everyone else on the show are BRILLIANT, but the depiction of Andrew and Molly in seasons 3 and 4 made me the happiest. There's nothing like a hot Asian man being not only desirable, but desired on the big screen. And he delivers a spanking that will stay with me for the rest of my life. Plus, healthy conflict resolution and ... eventually healthy breaking up! Just competence boners all over the place.
 Suzanne: Korean face masks! Holy Moly sheet masks are 20 mins of heaven on your face. 
 For tons of bonus content, shout outs, and gifts, check out our PATREON!  Subscribe! Rate! Review! 
 Merch: Redbubble
 And follow our socials: 
 Instagram: @heavingbosoms
 Twitter: @heaving_bosoms
  Facebook
  Patreon Shout Out: 
 Caitlyn K, you are a Chalkydri, an angelic species in Greek mythology who dwells near the sun. The sight of you is so mesmerizing that woodland creatures spontaneously break into song when they lay eyes on you, kind of like Snow White or Cinderella, except you have the head of a crocodile, the feet and tail of a lion, and twelve wings. You are also rainbow-colored. It is said that you wake every day with the sun, and sing a song, causing all the birds in the world to sing with you. You basically spread happiness and wonder wherever you go, so rock on you beautiful angel of positivity!
Mentioned in this episode:
Preorder Naima Simone X Friends Book Boyfriend Box!!
This box has EVERYTHING you could ever want in a book boyfriend from Tessa Bailey, Avery Flynn, Farrah Rochon, Jayci Lee, Kennedy Ryan, Adriana Herrera, and Naima Simone.
You can look forward to paperbacks, signed book plates, limited edition book boyfriend mugs, the book boyfriend pajamas/loungewear, bookmarks and more!
Tiers include:
- Cinnamon Roll - $114.99
- The Alpha - - $169.99 
Enter the promo code BONKERS10 at checkout to receive $10 off!!! 
ONLY AVAILABLE UNTIL OCT 10, 2022!
If you have any questions, email orders@honeymagnolia.co.
https://heaving-bosoms.captivate.fm/nsbookboyfriends (Naima's Book Boyfriends)

Hey HBs! It's another boring episode of Heaving Bosoms..... AS IF!! Melody is joined by author Suzanne Park to recap the 1995 classic CLUELESS! Get ready for a big nostalgia recap! Check out Suzanne's work, The Perfect Escape, a YA rom-com and Loathe At First Sight, a sweet adult rom-com set in the video game industry with lots of enemies-to-lovers goodness (out August 18. 2020).. 

Bonus Content:

Magic Mike in the Zombie Apocalypse, Mark Wahlberg is racist trash who has been convicted of multiple hate crimes and please don't forget it, is Clueless a teen dating How-To? Suzanne and I unfortunately thought so, *Bing Boong Bong* Fire Safety with Erin, and so much more! 

Lady Loves: 

Melody: Insecure. The whole thing because Issa Rae and everyone else on the show are BRILLIANT, but the depiction of Andrew and Molly in seasons 3 and 4 made me the happiest. There's nothing like a hot Asian man being not only desirable, but desired on the big screen. And he delivers a spanking that will stay with me for the rest of my life. Plus, healthy conflict resolution and ... eventually healthy breaking up! Just competence boners all over the place.

Suzanne: Korean face masks! Holy Moly sheet masks are 20 mins of heaven on your face. 

For tons of bonus content, shout outs, and gifts, check out our PATREON!

You are also rainbow-colored. It is said that you wake every day with the sun, and sing a song, causing all the birds in the world to sing with you. You basically spread happiness and wonder wherever you go, so rock on you beautiful angel of positivity!
